content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)
- Furnace (position x2)
- Furnace (position x3)

### Iron plate factory at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Assembling machine (position z2) that crafts iron sticks
- Inserter (position a) that puts items into the assembling machine at position z1
- Inserter (position b) that puts items into the assembling machine at position z2

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
